title: Modern West Sussex Escape within Charming East Grinstead
description: Experience country charm with a stylish stay at Crowne Plaza Felbridge - Gatwick, an IHG Hotel, located in quaint East Grinstead in the UK's West Sussex county. Spend your days wandering the market town, taking day trips to the breathtaking High Weald and South Downs National Park, or travelling through time with a visit to Chartwell House and Hever Castle. Fuel up each day with a hearty English breakfast at Bay Tree Restaurant or opt for a blissful treatment at Chakra Spa.
